divs: Sighting Details1.family home 2.heard the jet 3.ufo 4.amazment 5.three metal disk following amilitary jet,flying aprox.100 yards behind and in triangle formation.6.whenf.b.i. pulled into yard. they wanted to know what had happen a few days beforeatthe railroad tracks about a quarter of a mile from our house.a friend saw atriangle shape object as big as a houseon the tracks.also several people in town5 miles north saw this object.
